text:
Thanks for the note. Things are
crazy, but good. Good crazy?

Each of your words was like a
designer sweater warming me.

Just getting a note in the mail is
enough to brighten my day.

Just wait until you see what I'm
writing back to you!

Your note was like a cup of coffee
on the sleepiest morning.

I read your card so fast that I
already forgot what it said.
Guess I'll read it again...

I keep your card near my favorite
pair of shoes. No reason why,
that's just what I do.

If this reply smells like cologne...
please rate its smell on a scale
from 8-10.

There's a lot I want to say, but I
have to say it in person so I can
over pronounce the foreign words.

I chose this card based on one
aspect of your personality. Can
you guess which one it is?
I'd say more, but I don't want to.
